subject: Cancellation Letter
body:
Cancellation Letter
ATTENTION DEAR BENEFICIARY
Notification Cancellation Letter from the federal rules of law
Says that any abandon fund or unclaimed fund should be cancel if the owner
fails to follow the rules of law, and pay the needed fee to complete
this transaction successfully, in the federal Court of law
any unfinished foreign transaction from 2 mounts to one year have
to be cancel or the fund owner have to obey the recent law and pay the
needed fee.
In federal point of view you are to choose and sign if this
payment of US$4.8,million US dollars should be cancel or not then make
choice and sign (Yes ) or (No) (continue) or (stop)or this
approved payment will be divert into Government account period.
Try to Confirm your details if you still want your total fund,the
only money you will is sum of $200 usd only to sign your ownership
certificate, no any kind of fee will ever ask from after this,confirm
your details and provide the fee to get successful
Receiver's Name__
Address: ____
Country: ____
Phone Number: ___
Confirm your Bank details_
Your ID
-----------
Best Regards Dr.
Mrs. Gloria Uba

subject: Re: Cancellation Letter
body:
Hello Dr. Mrs. Gloria Uba,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this unclaimed fund situation. I'm not entirely clear on some of the details, though.

Could you please explain a bit more about what this fund is and how it came to be unclaimed? Also, could you clarify what the fee is for and why it needs to be paid?

I'm also curious about the process of signing for ownership. How does that work exactly? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marie
